author: cperezz.eth
content:
<@427903869226582018> addition chains are rarely faster. They're focused more on giving a ct_time impl rather than optimizing to oblivion.

That said, there are exceptions. I think Whaby built a go lib to derive addition chains for curves. Maybe worth checking that.

content: ?Are there any EIPs / data for doing Homomorphic operations onchain
